metadata.description: Additional information related to the transfer

reversals.description: Details of any reversals associated with the transfer

object.description: The object type, in this case, 'list'

has_more.description: Indicates if there are more reversals to retrieve

url.description: URL to retrieve all reversals for the transfer

id.description: The unique identifier of the transfer

statement_description.description: The description appearing on the recipient's bank statement

balance_transaction.description: The balance transaction associated with the transfer

reversed.description: Indicates if the transfer was fully or partially reversed

created.description: The timestamp when the transfer was created

updated.description: The timestamp when the transfer was last updated

amount_reversed.description: The amount that was reversed from the transfer

source_type.description: The type of the transfer source, e.g., card, bank account

source_transaction.description: The source transaction that funded the transfer

date.description: The date the transfer was initiated

livemode.description: Indicates if the transfer was made in live mode

statement_descriptor.description: An optional statement descriptor appended to the recipient's bank statement

failure_balance_transaction.description: The balance transaction information for a failed transfer

recipient.description: The recipient of the transfer, usually a connected account

destination.description: The destination bank account or card where the funds are transferred

automatic.description: Indicates if the transfer was processed automatically

object.description: The object type, in this case, 'transfer'

currency.description: The currency of the transfer amount

transfer_group.description: A unique identifier for the transfer group if multiple transfers are linked

arrival_date.description: The date the funds are expected to arrive in the destination bank account

destination_payment.description: The destination payment id if applicable
